thread.title: Reid says Jamaal Charles appears to have torn ACL
thread.title_full: Reid says Jamaal Charles appears to have torn ACL - KCTV5

author: Chris Oberholtz, Multimedia Producer
title: Reid says Jamaal Charles appears to have torn ACL
text:
KANSAS CITY, MO (KCTV/AP) - Chiefs coach Andy Reid says that the preliminary diagnosis on Jamaal Charles' injury is a torn ACL in the running back's right knee.
"It looks more like a torn ACL than anything else," Chiefs coach Andy Reid said. "We'll have an MRI on it tomorrow and we'll just see how that goes."
Charles left Kansas City's 18-17 loss to Chicago in the third quarter. He was hurt on a carry deep in Chicago territory, as he was cutting left at the line.
He immediately grabbed his right knee - Charles tore the ACL in his left knee in 2012 - and was helped straight to the locker room by a trainer and teammate Justin Houston.
